de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.gui

Class ShellCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.gui.ShellCenter

  • public class ShellCenter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a simple functionality to center RyCONs widgets.

    This is done because of there is no simple method in SWT.

    Since:
    1
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    sebastian

    • Method Detail

      • centeredShellLocation

        public org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Point centeredShellLocation()
        Calculates the centered shell location and returns it als Point object.

        The centered shell location depends on the screen size and the shell size. For calculation these parameters are read from the display and shell objects from the calling widget. The coordinates of the centered shell location represents the upper left corner of the widget.

        Return:
        centered shell location
